name: Port of Mokha Inc.
description: Developer of a subscription-based online coffee-selling platform intended to empower coffee farmers through social impact. The company's platform allows users to take up online monthly coffee subscriptions, buy gift boxes, and brew gear as well as choose from multiple coffee roasters, enabling farmers to create a more economically and environmentally sustainable farming economy.
one_liner: Developer of a subscription-based online coffee-selling platform intended to empower coffee farmers through social impact. The company's platform allows users to take up online monthly coffee subscriptions, buy gift boxes, and brew gear as well as choose from multiple coffee roasters, enabling farmers to create a more economically and environmentally sustainable farming economy.
